thread.title: MSSA football: Don Bosco beat Campion 1-0
thread.title_full: MSSA football: Don Bosco beat Campion 1-0 - Sports

author: Rufus Vedanayagam
title: MSSA football: Don Bosco beat Campion 1-0
text:
Don Bosco (Matunga) registered a 1-0 win over Campion (Colaba) in the Mumbai Schools Sports Association (MSSA) boys' U-14 Div I Pool 'D' inter-school football match at Azad Maidan, yesterday.


Campion High School's Krish Suri (left) and Don Bosco's Nathan Murzello vie for the ball in the MSSA U-14 inter-school football match yesterday. Pic/Suresh KK 
The Matunga outfit got the lead in the 17th minute from an own-goal by Campion's Krish Suri. The win put Don Bosco on top of Pool 'D' with three wins from three matches, but has made the fight for second place very interesting. With just two games to play, Cathedral & John Connon, St Stanislaus and Campion are tied at four points having won one, drawn one and lost one.
Stanislaus is currently second with a better goal difference (+8) after they thrashed Colaba Municipal School 9-0 yesterday. Campion stand third (zero goal difference) while Cathedral & John Connon are fourth (-1 goal difference). St Xavier's (Marine Lines) is fifth (two points) and Colaba Municipal is in bottom place (one point).
